About Us

Some addictions are hard to overcome.

Hi, we are Rotor RE-hab and we are rotary engine addicts.

We too have struggled with rotary engine problems for many years. We have been through all the ups and downs, from the high you get when you cut your fastest lap time , to the pain you feel when your engine just won't work right. We have lost friends because of late nights in the garage trying to feed the rotor addiction. We have gained many friends in search of that rush when the turbo kicks in.

We have suffered engine failure so you don't have to.

Our mission is to help rotary engines reach their full potential. We welcome, with open arms, any engine that has been abused, neglected, and those that seek more power. We want to ensure that every chassis that carries these amazing engines can do so to the best of its abilities. We want to make sure that no one feels the pain of rotor RE-lapse.

Because every engine needs a helping hand.
